contentrichtext.text: '''Vidyasagar''' may refer to: ;People *[[Ishwar Chandra Vidyasagar]], the Bengali scholar (1820-1891) *[[Acharya Vidyasagar]], the prominent Digambar Jain Acharya (1946-) *[[Vidyasagar (music director)]], the South Indian music director ;Other *[[Vidyasagar Setu]], commonly known as the Second Hooghly Bridge, a bridge in West Bengal, India linking Howrah to Kolkata *[[Vidyasagar University]], in [[Paschim Medinipur district|Midnapore]], West Bengal, India {{disambiguation|surname}}
